alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 12:03AM EST until January 20 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...SNOW IMPACTS THE AREA TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow and sleet accumulations between 2 and 4 inches for a storm total of 3 to 8 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of central and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Heavy wet snow will cause weighted tree limbs of conifers and leafed trees, leading to some snapped branches. Isolated to scattered outages possible. Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
